faq.title: Everything you need to
faq.subtitle: From security to use cases, here's what founders and teams ask most.

items.question: Is Hikai replacing my marketing team?
items.answer: Not at all. Marketing teams actually get more out of Hikai: less time chasing product updates, more time focusing on strategy and creativity.

items.question: When is the Beta launching?
items.answer: We're opening early access soon. Join the waitlist to be among the first founders to try it out.

items.question: What kind of content does Hikai create?
items.answer: From product updates to blog posts, user docs and social media. Everything comes directly from what's happening in your product.

items.question: Which teams can benefit from Hikai?
items.answer: Any team that needs to generate product-related content: marketing, customer success, even product and engineering. Hikai reduces the coordination overhead and makes updates effortless.

items.question: I'm a solo founder — is Hikai for me?
items.answer: Exactly. You are product, marketing, and customer success all at once. Hikai helps you cover those roles without the extra effort.

items.question: Is my product data safe with Hikai?
items.answer: Yes. Hikai only works with summaries of what's happening — never raw code or sensitive data. And you always have the final word before anything goes public.
